class.name: GodotInstance
class.brief_description: Provides access to an embedded Godot instance.
class.description: GodotInstance represents a running Godot instance that is controlled from an outside codebase, without a perpetual main loop. It is created by the C API libgodot_create_godot_instance. Only one may be created per process.

method.name: is_started
method.description: Returns true if this instance has been fully started.

method.name: iteration
method.description: Runs a single iteration of the main loop. Returns true if the engine is attempting to quit.

method.name: start
method.description: Finishes this instance's startup sequence. Returns true on success.
